feat.value: MONB.GL 75 transcribed in Paris by David Brakke, March 2010; MONB.GL 76 transcribed from microfilm by Bentley Layton, Spring 2005, collated in Paris by David Brakke, March 2010; transcription does not record spaces and paleographic rendition of letters other than ekthetics. English translation published in David Brakke's and Andrew Crislip's Selected Discourses of Shenoute the Great (Cambridge University Press, 2015).
